gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 117, Spurs 101
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Spurs, 117-101. Donovan Mitchell recorded 31 points, eight rebounds, and seven assists for the Cavaliers, with Jarrett Allen adding 26 points and 16 rebounds in the victory. Devin Vassell tallied 22 points, six rebounds, and three assists for the Spurs in the losing effort. The Cavaliers have won 5 straight and improve to 31-16, while the Spurs fall to 10-40.
